alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills; South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 3:55AM PST until December 30 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches at lower elevations, and up to 10 inches on higher peaks and passes. * WHERE...South Washington Cascade Foothills and South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel may be challenging over the higher terrain and secondary roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: South Washington Cascade Foothills; South Washington Cascades
